experience.position1: I worked as an IT consultant, focusing on system upgrades and application development. I gained experience in modern web technologies while contributing to key internal projects.

experience.position5: During my 3-month internship, I gained first-hand experience of development, applying my skills to real-life projects.

project.desc1: Led the migration of Banky Foiben'i Madagasikara's intranet platform from Symfony 3.4 to Symfony 6.4, ensuring better performance, enhanced security, and improved maintainability. This upgrade involved adapting legacy code, updating dependencies, and implementing best practices to optimize the system for long-term stability
project.desc2: Developed a cross-platform mobile app for e-commerce, enhancing the shopping experience with a user-friendly interface and optimized performance for both Android and iOS devices
